CustomField.formula: IF( Customer_InappropriateHandling__c = TRUE || Disclosing_Customer_Data__c = TRUE || Use_Of_Inappropriate_Language__c = TRUE || Obtain_Credit_Card_Info__c = TRUE || Web_ID_Not_Obtained__c = TRUE || Billing_Address_Not_Verified__c = TRUE, "Failed", "Passed")
CustomField.label: Auto Fail
